TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bgayaw, title = bgayaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bgayaw} }

S.FORM: bgayaw galan nha' qu bgayaw hiya' ma. mutu wahan maniq na bzyok qnhyun qu bway na bgayaw. sraral hiya' ga, ssabu' ta' nniqun qu abaw bgayaw.
bgayaw galan nha' qo bgayaw hiya' ma. moto wahan maniq na bzyok qnhyon qo bway na bgayaw. sraral hiya' ga, ssabo' ta' nniqon qo abaw bgayaw.
